title: Chicken and Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1 parsnip, sliced', '1 turnip, quartered', '2 carrots, quartered', '2 stalks celery, quartered', '1 leek, quartered', '1 onion, quartered', '3 sprigs fresh parsley', '3 sprigs fresh dill', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
